content: Trying to enlist and have discovered no one takes single parent except National Guard and the reserves. What kind of paperwork will I have to provide, besides Family Care Plan? Question: Will I have to provide original divorce decree and custody documents at time of enlistment? Choices: Yes, I will have to provide custody paperwork No, I only need Family Care Plan
